page.title: 16NEW HOUSING IN BOW
page.content: {Public Housing }A close of 6 semi- detached houses is being built.They have 2 or 3 bedrooms,lounge,kitchen_ diner,bathroom and toilet.Heating is electric,Economy 7. They have small gardens,and will lie surrounded by landscaped banks, trees and parking spaces.The total cost will be Â£200,000 and the D.C.C has 2.3 acres for future dwellings.The building contractors are Midas, established 7 years ago.They use sub-contractors for craftsmen's jobs and tarmac-ing. {Private Housing There will be 51 houses on pleasantly laid-out estate.There are 3_bedroom houses 4_bedroomed chalet bungalows and 2-bedroom bungalows.They have large lounges,kitchens,bathrooms and garages.Heating is electric,Economy 7.They have mains drainage and water. They cost Â£30,000 to Â£34,000.Eakers are the builders established 24 years.
